snippet: An Arizona Supreme Court justice was confirmed as a United States appellate judge despite complaints from conservatives that he influenced the Roe v. Wade ruling on abortion while a law clerk four decades ago.
abstract: Arizona Supreme Court justice Andrew David Hurwitz is confirmed as a United States appellate judge despite complaints from conservatives that he influenced the Roe v Wade ruling on abortion while a law clerk four decades ago.
lead_paragraph: An Arizona Supreme Court justice was confirmed as a United States appellate judge despite complaints from conservatives that he influenced the Roe v. Wade ruling on abortion while a law clerk four decades ago.

headline.main: Senate Confirms Appellate Judge, Rebuffing Critics
headline.print_headline: Senate Confirms Appellate Judge, Rebuffing Critics
